Customer Experience NEC's NeoFace Welcome provides a new and unique visitor welcome that is personalised customer experience. Digital Identity NEC's face recognition solutions have used by many counties around the world to identify and verify well over a billion people. Safety & Security NEC has deep expertise and offers a wide range of security and surveillance solutions including world-leading NeoFace Watch Wireless Transport NEC is the leading global provider of point-to-point microwave solutions, delivering wireless transport solutions for over 30 years.
